alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 11:18AM EDT until March 28 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .Minor flooding is occurring along the Green River at Paradise. The river is forecast to crest this evening at 381.3 feet. It will fall below flood stage late Monday evening. For the Green River...including Paradise...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 380.0 feet, Water rises over the skimmer wall at the TVA fossil plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 380.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 381.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
